entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, introduced as 'he' and described as looking around.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: A wizard who is sitting on Harry's right and left, watching Crouch's son being dragged away by Dementors.

relationships.description: Albus Dumbledore is sitting on Harry's right, watching Crouch's son being dragged away by Dementors.
The Dumbledore on his left puts his hand under Harry's elbow and helps him rise into the air.
